Text: HeyHi Joe This is Marcy Tim forwarded your email to me at home WOW We had not heard the news but are very happy you let us know Hows fatherhood Sounds like you have your hands full traveling back to Orlando every weeks but its well worth it We wish you the best of luck and would love to see a picture of Payton if you have one to spare Our address is Cherry Hill Road Greenwich CT Keep in touch and let us know how you and Payton are doing Fondly Marcy Hanna Original Message From mailto Sent Friday August AM To Subject RE hello Thanks for the info I have something to tell you that will blow you away I cant believe Serge didnt tell you I should have called and told you myself but Ive been so busy and this is why Im a father YesCan you believe that My son Payton L Stepenovitch was born May Did I tell you I got engaged to that girl I was dating in Orlando Well we are separated now and she is back in Florida with my son I miss him so much but I go home every weeks she wants to be close to her family as well as mine I dont know if things will workout with her and I but we have the most beautiful son in the world Ill send you some pictureswhat is your address Are you blown away Me too anyway give Marcy my best and Ill call you this weekend Joe Step no Mrthats dad Original Message From Tim Hanna ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESTimHannaCthannasempratradingEcomEENRON ENRONcom Sent Friday August AM To Stepenovitch Joe Subject RE hello Mr Step James worked at Statoil and then at SETC for over a year He never directly worked for me The impression I got was the was that he was organized and has a good understanding of energy transmission losses etc He helped the East goup with NEISONYISO for about a month and then was a day person and then hour peron working for Missy Ellis trying to do real time business in the Midcon no comment by me on this SETC email I do not think he ever has experienced real trading where he is actively buying and selling I am sure he could learn trading if put in the that environment Marcy is doing great buying lots of things for the house How is your life outside of ENE Any new serious gf My friend Rudy Stoett Jim F knows him is moving to Houston this weekend to work for Texaco Let me know if you want to talk more about Mr Vasquez Have a good weekend Tim W H Original Message From mailto Sent Friday August AM To Subject RE hello Good Morning Tim Do you know James Vasquez Looks like he traded the East His he a good guy Im interviewing him next week Can you give me some info Joe Step Jr This email contains privileged attorneyclient communications
